title: Everything Sucks
lyrics: Everything sucks, just kiddin Everything is great, no really I haven't thought about my ex today oh wait (fuck I just did) But I went outside for the first time in a Few days and it felt nice and I Might try doing exercise (hahah not really) I wanna forget my bad days, all my bad days And be okay, and be okay Spend my spare change down at the arcade Everything sucks just kidding Everything is better than it used to be I didn't write a song about my ex today (oh wait) But I called my friends and I told them We should hang out if we make sense 'Cause I miss them and hate being alone (oh really) I wanna forget my bad days, all my bad days And be okay, and be okay Spend my spare change down at the arcade I wanna forget my bad days, all my bad days Spend my spare change down at the arcade I wanna forget my bad days, all my bad days And be okay, and be okay Spend my spare change down at the arcade Everything sucks (just kidding)
